text: {"grade": 1, "reasoning": "The response explicitly addresses the 'but-for' test under the heading '1.1. \u201cBut\u201d-for\u201d test (R v White [1910] 2 KB 124)' and correctly applies it to the facts: 'If B had not swerved, C\u2019s car would have continued straight down the lane and would not have struck the median. Therefore, but for B\u2019s swerving, C would not have been injured. The \u201cbut-for\u201d test is satisfied.' This fully satisfies the criterion.", "criterion_id": "45bda782-91df-4f35-a4c7-f08650b38817"}
